channel.title: Gambling Npc
channel.description:
This is my first time attempting to add a gambling npc let alone an npc that can talk. :D
So far he can say hi , your name and ask If you want to gamble then when you hit continue he gives the options "yes" or "no" But for some reason the next chat isn't coming up....
[img]http://i.imgur.com/lL7NPK7.png[/img]
I just need to know what is causing the next line not to show and i'll probably be able to get the rest. But also in game when I click "yes" to gamble it says this in the chat box,
[img]http://i.imgur.com/be7lXfs.png[/img]

item.title: Gambling Npc
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

post everything you added, if you want to add my skype send me your skype in pm.

Read full topic

item.title: Gambling Npc
item.dc:creator: @portugalrox portugalrox
item.description:
@portugalrox wrote:

[quote=“Strucker, post:2, topic:542526”]You need to handle the actionbuttons, they’re handled in clickingbuttons.java
the yes option is handled in clickingbuttons.java by the case 9157, and the no option in the same location by the case 9158

If you need any more help i can help you man :P[/quote]
Thanks but I had those inputted. I can show you the guide I used. But basically I can choose yes or no and it will just go to the chatbox rather than to continue with the npc talking.

Read full topic

item.title: Gambling Npc
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

You need to handle the actionbuttons, they’re handled in clickingbuttons.java
the yes option is handled in clickingbuttons.java by the case 9157, and the no option in the same location by the case 9158

If you need any more help i can help you man

Read full topic
